programme.desc: On August 24, 1939, at a small French cafe, six friends are about to go their separate ways. They vow to reunite on that day each year at the cafe. The film follows each of their lives: one begins work with the French resistance, one joins the French commandos, another is forced to join the Nazi army, one becomes a flier, and the two others are just simple officers. On the day Paris is liberated, the three surviving friends meet at the cafe and get drunk.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: Five couples from Atlanta buckle up to deal with the joys and sorrows of having a baby for the first time. However, they soon realise that parenthood demands a lot more than they anticipated.

credits.actor: Cameron Diaz,Jennifer Lopez,Elizabeth Banks,Chace Crawford,Brooklyn Decker,Anna Kendrick,Matthew Morrison,Dennis Quaid,Chris Rock,Rodrigo Santoro,Ben Falcone,Joe Manganiello,Tom Lennon,Amir Talai,Rob Huebel

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

credits.actor: Omar Sy,Iza Higelin,Michael Gregorio,Benot Allemane,Fodor Atkine,Joshua Ballard,Trevor Devall,Damien Boisseau

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes. She takes an opportunity to escape for a week, hiding out in the house of her new 16-year-old friend Annika and her world-weary single dad.

credits.actor: Keira Knightley,Chlo Grace Moretz,Sam Rockwell,Ellie Kemper,Mark Webber,Jeff Garlin,Gretchen Mol,Kaitlyn Dever,Daniel Zovatto,Jodi Thelen,Dylan Arnold

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

credits.actor: Ensemble Cast

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

credits.actor: Michael Douglas,Diane Keaton,Sterling Jerins,Frances Sternhagen,Maurice Jones,Andy Karl,Austin Lysy,Annie Parisse,Scott Shepherd,Frankie Valli,Michael Terra,Sawyer Tanner Simpkins,Maxwell Simpkins,Luke Robertson,Meryl Williams,Rob Reiner

programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

credits.actor: Marion Cotillard

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

credits.actor: Mandira Bedi,Shibani Dandekar

programme.title: Pudsey the Dog: The Movie
programme.desc: Pudsey, a cheeky stray dog from London, is happy being alone until he meets Molly, George and Tommy. As he settles in with his new family, Pudsey discovers Thorne and Fautus are planning something terrible for the village, and he must stop them.

credits.actor: Olivia Colman,David Walliams,Izzy Meikle-Small,Jessica Hynes,Jim Tavar,John Sessions,Maggie Steed,Luke Tittensor

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Milo is hired to track down his ex-wife, Nicole, for skipping bail. Subsequently, a routine retrieval turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse, forcing them both to go on the run together.

credits.actor: Jennifer Aniston,Gerard Butler,Christine Baranski,Jason Sudeikis,Jeff Garlin,Ritchie Coster,Cathy Moriarty,Peter Greene,Joel Marsh Garland,Dorian Missick,Siobhan Fallon Hogan,Carol Kane,Adam Rose,Matt Malloy,Jason Kolotouros,j Joe Polito
